title: Supply and demand shifts change P and Q of beans

content.question: Last year 17 million tons of beans were sold for $300 per ton. This year 17 million tons of beans were sold for $285 per ton. Which of the following changes in demand and supply could have caused this outcome?

topic.text: 2.7: Market Disequilibrium and Changes in Equilibrium

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
